news.title: Weekly jobless claims surge to 241,000, more than expected, in latest sign of economic trouble
news.summary: Initial unemployment claims posted an unexpected increase last week. The increase could be a potential trouble sign for the wobbling U.S. economy.

news.title: U.S. Chamber of Commerce asks Trump for tariff exclusions to 'stave off a recession'
news.summary: President Donald Trump has held up tariffs as a key tool in trade negotiations. Some analysts warn the duties are hurting business and the overall economy.

news.title: McDonald’s reports largest U.S. same-store sales decline since 2020
news.summary: McDonald's narrowly beat on earnings per share for the first quarter. But the fast food chain fell short on revenue. The company reported a profit of $1.2 billion, up from $1 billion a year earlier.

news.title: Mercedes-Benz to add new vehicle to Alabama plant amid Trump tariffs
news.summary: Mercedes-Benz says it will add a new vehicle to its plant in Alabama. The move comes amid President Donald Trump's auto tariff.

news.title: Eli Lilly CEO says company can help 'respond' to national security concerns around essential drugs as tariffs loom
news.summary: Ricks said reshoring manufacturing capacity for older essential medicines is "a valid thing" He added that Eli Lilly is "happy to help"

news.title: Jobless claims rise to highest level since October, but not from tariff war
news.summary: Companies are not laying off workers by large amounts, and are still watching and waiting amid uncertainty about how the economy manages the higher tariffs.

news.title: What investors are overlooking at Nvidia, Apple and a cruise-line operator, according to this fund manager
news.summary: The chief investment officer at Silvant Capital talks about what investors are overlooking at Nvidia, Apple and a cruise-ship giant. The CEO of Silvant says investors should be focusing on the long-term potential of these companies.

news.title: Estee Lauder to lay off up to 7,000 — more than it initially planned
news.summary: Estee Lauder said it would adopt a ‘more competitive approach’ to its procurement. It would consolidate its spending and re-evaluating its suppliers.

news.title: What 150 years of stock-market data says about performance during high-tariff eras
news.summary: A unique database of investment returns that dates back to 1875 shows that high tariffs can coexist with stock-market gains. The data was compiled by a team of economists at the University of Chicago.

news.title: No, Donald Trump. This is not Joe Biden’s stock market. It’s yours.
news.summary: This is Trump's economy, too. He needs to own it. This is Trump’s economy. He should own it, and he should own up to it.
